title: why the remake?
body: I played a ranked game earlier with first blood within 5 minutes and still the remake went though. Don't know how to post the screen shot. Or should I just send it to riot directly or has the remake rules changed?

replies.body: Lol They changed it so that first blood won't count cause some cheeky people cause easily go 5 bot get first blood and remake won't go through that's why they changed it to if someone is AFK and it hits 3 min you can remake doesn't matter what happens in between. Though honestly it should be changed to if someone is afk for more than 3 min at anytime of the game you should be able to remake or get a loss prevented cause someone could wait till the 3 min mark then afk and your basically screwed
That's a very good point too.
I think as long as someone hasn't connected, remake goes ahead even with first blood.
Oh ok nvm. I thought first blood counted against it. My bad then. Thx ^ btw
It does if someone AFKs after FB but before 3 mins (you won't be able to remake). As long as the person is AFK before FB (whatever team it's on), the remake will still go through.
I think its if the team withiut the dc gets fb the remake can still go through. But if the team with the afk gets first blood it will no longer be able to be remade?

Wow that's a terrible rule? They get to choose and an advantage. Someone could legit afk for 5 minutes team gets first blood and you come back but if you don't get first blood then the team remakes. That's worst Riot call 2016 imo!
